SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class BaseManagementController<T extends BaseManagementController.BaseRecord>

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.BaseManagementController<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of record being managed, must extend BaseRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CourseManagementController, StudentManagementController, TeacherExamManagementController, TeacherManagementController, TeacherQuestionBankManagementController
public abstract class BaseManagementController<T extends BaseManagementController.BaseRecord> extends Object implements Initializable
Abstract base controller class for managing records in the exam system. Provides common CRUD operations and filtering functionality for different types of records.

    Base record class containing common fields for all record types.
